title: Meeting Submission Form
description: The meeting submission form allows users to submit information about their talks

sections.Description: Add basic information about this meeting event

widgets.label: Event Type
widgets.description: Select the type of event that is being submitted. Events may be "talk" or "poster"

widgets.label: Title
widgets.description: Enter the title of the file.

widgets.label: Description
widgets.description: Add a brief description explaining what this talk or poster is about

sections.label: Speakers
sections.description: Add the names of the speakers for this talk

widgets.label: Speakers
widgets.description: Select the names of the people that will be spealing at the talk or are authors of the poster

sections.label: Materials
sections.description: Upload the materials that are related to this meeting event

widgets.label: Use an existing node
widgets.description: Any materials related to this talk are stored in an OSF Project. Files are automatically uploaded to a new project. If a project containing the materials that are related to this talk already exists, that project may be selected instead of creating a new one. Click here to learn more about OSF projects. (This link will open in a new window.)
